snippet.title: Pandora's box short play (Apple II - Datamost)
snippet.description:
Pandora's box (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/pandoras-box__) was an action game published by Datamost in 1982 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the short play!

PS: The # of lives is stored at $826 and you can get infinite lives by changing $158D to $AD.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com (hoeksmas)
Disk image - 4AM
